SoundEcology2 0.0.11
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

aci()

Acoustic Complexity Index

aci_folder()

Acoustic Complexity Index - Batch process

add_replicate_id()

Add replicate id for a dataset with severall treatments

adi()

Acoustic Diversity Index

adi_folder()

Calculate the Acoustic Diversity Index on the Files in a Folder

adi_heatmap()

ADI Heatmap

aei()

Acoustic Evenness Index

aei_folder()

Acoustic Evenness Index - folder input

bbai()

Broadband Activity Index

bbai_folder()

Calculate BBAI for all the Files in a Folder

bi()

Bioacoustic Index

bi_folder()

Bioacoustic Index - folder input

diel_spectrogram()

Generate a Diel Spectrogram from multiple Audio Recordings

dynamicity()

Calculate Soundscape Dynamicity

fadi()

Frequency-dependent Acoustic Diversity Index

fadi_folder()

Frequency-dependent Acoustic Diversity Index - folder input

fci()

Frequency Cover Indices (FCI)

fci_folder()

Frequency Cover Indices on Multiple WAV Files in a Folder

first_recording_hour()

Subsample a dataset with only the first recording in each hour

get_fft_params()

Calculate FFT Parameters

harmonize_index()

Harmonize "old" soundecology2 output with new SoundEcology2 table format

import_indices()

Import and Merge CSV Files Matching a Pattern

import_kaleidoscope()

Import tidy dataset from Kaleidoscope

import_kaleidoscope_batch()

Batch Import and Process Kaleidoscope Files in Parallel

import_stereo_mix()

Import a Stereo Wave File as Mono and Optionally Remove DC Offset

index_ts()

Create time series analysis and visualization for acoustic index data

indices_summary()

Summary of Acoustic Indices

list_csvs()

List the CSV files in a directory

list_waves()

List wave files in a directory

mean_spectrum_flip()

Plot a Mean Spectrum with Flipped Axes

merge_index_results()

Merge Index Results from CSV Files

merge_se2_indices()

Merge CSV outputs of several indices calculated with SoundEcology2

nbai()

Narrow-Band Activity Index

nbai_folder()

Narrow-Band Activity Index for Files in a Folder

ndsi()

Normalized Difference Soundscape Index

ndsi_folder()

Normalized Difference Soundscape Index - folder input

plot_diel_indices()

Plot Diel Indices with Optional LOESS Smoothing and Scaling Transformations

spectral_dynamics()

Spectral Dynamics Analysis

spectrogram()

Plot a Spectrogram with Customizable Parameters

spectrogram_3d()

Generate a 3D Spectrogram

spectrogram_binary()

Generate a Binary Spectrogram

spectrogram_cutoff()

Generate a Spectrogram with Energy Cutoff

spectrogram_plotly()

Plot Spectrogram Using Plotly

summary_spectrograms()

Generate and Save Summary Spectrograms

tai()

Trill Activity Index

tai_folder()

Calculate Trill Activity Index for all the Files in a Folder

wave_integrity_batch()

Compute file integrity diagnostics for several folders containing WAV files
